Title: Sultan Agung: Tahta, Perjuangan, Cinta
Writer: Ifan Ismail (script writer), Bagas Pudjilaksono, Mooryati Soedibyo (script writer)
Actors: Ario Bayu, Marthino Lio, Adinia Wirasti, Putri Marino
Plot: The story about Sultan Agung of Mataram, how he ascended the throne and had to face VOC in great wars, the events that caused his people's misery.
